mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_patient (`name`, sex, birth_year, nation, height, weight, blood_type, address, id_card, stm_poss, `time`) VALUES (#{name}, #{sex}, #{birthYear}, #{nation}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{bloodType}, #{address}, #{idCard}, #{stmPoss}, #{time})
mapper.select: SELECT `name`, sex, birth_year, nation, height, weight, blood_type, address, id_card, stm_poss, `time` FROM tb_patient ORDER BY `time` desc
